column2: checking on us is good. But coming and asking too frequently whether we need anything else/ whether we're gonna order some more is a little uncomfortable. To me
column3: experience is the second important thing (of course
column4: the first thing is food) when I evaluate a restaurant but it was bad today. It felt like she wanted us to either order more or eat quickly and just leave. Yeah
column5: more people started to come in for dinner but it wasn't that busy like last time when I came during the weekend. There were still empty tables. Also
column6: when we got out receipt I wrote down my LettuceEats number on the receipt but it seemed like she didn't add it so I asked her and she said she'll add it later. I checked and it's not added.
